quality_assessment: Documentation is comprehensive and covers most advanced analysis features well. Minor issues with default threshold values that don't match codebase.

issues.description: The --pattern-threshold example shows 0.8 as the value, but the default in the codebase is 0.7
issues.fix_suggestion: Either remove the specific value from the example or note that the default is 0.7

issues.description: The --public-api-threshold example shows 0.5 as the value, but the default in the codebase is 0.7
issues.fix_suggestion: Either remove the specific value from the example or note that the default is 0.7

issues.description: The subsection topics mention 'Attribution' but there is no section in the documentation covering attribution troubleshooting
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a section on attribution analysis troubleshooting, or remove 'Attribution' from the topics list if not needed

issues.description: The documented patterns list (god_object, long_function, complex_conditional, deep_nesting) does not cover all detected patterns in the codebase (observer, singleton, factory, strategy, callback, template_method)
issues.fix_suggestion: Add note that --patterns flag accepts additional pattern types: observer, singleton, factory, strategy, callback, template_method

positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of multi-pass analysis with clear when-to-disable guidance
Well-structured call graph debugging section with all available flags documented
Clear god object type explanations (god_class, god_file, god_module)
Functional analysis section covers all profile options (strict, balanced, lenient)
Good cross-references to related troubleshooting pages
improvement_suggestions: Add attribution troubleshooting section to match the topics list
Include a troubleshooting section for when analysis produces unexpected results
Document the interaction between multi-pass and context analysis flags

metadata.validation_focus: Check advanced analysis troubleshooting is comprehensive
